abstract: Spectrum Brands on Wednesday said it would sell its pet supply business to Salton in a deal worth up to $915 million, with financing from private equity firm and hedge fund Harbinger Capital Partners.
lead_paragraph: Spectrum Brands on Wednesday said it would sell its pet supply business to Salton in a deal worth up to $915 million, with financing from private equity firm and hedge fund Harbinger Capital Partners.

headline.main: Harbinger and Salton Wrap Up Deal for Spectrum Unit
